sentence.Network_cn: 用温和的漂白剂浸泡以去除污迹。

sentence.Network_cn: 太阳会使你脸上的汗毛发白。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English  blæ̃can (verb), blæ̃ce (noun), from blæ̃c 'pale', of Germanic origin; related to bleak

entry.def: If you bleach something, you use a chemical to make it white or pale in colour.

example.ex: These products don't bleach the hair.
example.tran: 这些产品不会使头发变白。
市面上的面粉是经过人工漂白的。

entry.def: If the sun bleaches something, or something bleaches, its colour gets paler until it is almost white.

example.ex: The tree's  roots are stripped and hung to season and bleach...
example.tran: 树根剥皮后挂起来风干晒白。

example.ex: The sun will bleach the hairs on your face...
example.tran: 太阳会使你脸上的汗毛发白。

entry.def: Bleach is a chemical that is used to make cloth white, or to clean things thoroughly and kill germs.

means.word_mean: 1. the whiteness that results from removing the color from something;

sentences.sentence: "a complete bleach usually requires several applications"

means.word_mean: 2. an agent that makes things white or colorless
3. the act of whitening something by bleaching it (exposing it to sunlight or using a chemical bleaching agent)

auth_sentence.content: She gives them soap and bleach to wash their hands.
auth_sentence.res_content: She gives them soap and bleach to wash their hands.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She gives them soap and bleach to wash their hands.

auth_sentence.content: My cleaner insists on using lots of bleach in the bathroom.
auth_sentence.res_content: My cleaner insists on using lots of bleach in the bathroom.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: My cleaner insists on using lots of bleach in the bathroom.

auth_sentence.content: Mert liked to dress up and bleach his friends' hair.
auth_sentence.res_content: Mert liked to dress up and bleach his friends' hair.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Mert liked to dress up and bleach his friends' hair.

means.word_mean: 使(颜色)变淡, 变白; 漂白（使）晒白，退色

sentences.en: The sun has bleached her yellow skirt.
sentences.cn: 阳光把她的黄裙子晒得褪色了。

sentences.en: Use some bleach on this shirt.
sentences.cn: 用些漂白剂漂白这件衬衣。

jushi.english: His hair bleached in the sun.
jushi.chinese: 风吹日晒，他的头发变白了。

jushi.english: A few dry bones of animals bleached on the desert sand.
jushi.chinese: 一些干枯的动物尸骨在沙漠上变白了。

jushi.english: Her hair was bleached by the sun.
jushi.chinese: 她的头发被太阳晒得发白。
